name: OFFCUBE TECHNOLOGIES
description: Problem Statement: Getting at an unknown place is always a problem and we are trying to solve this with the automation of travel guides that are around via chatting as well as calling along with a chat bot for the booking services as well.
additional: Present Project: Tripzana- A chat based travel assistant along with railway food service.Future Project: Expanding the railway food service in the whole state, Machine Learning

name: OUI
description: Present Project: insi8 - A one stop solution that helps users find the ideal electronic device, based on the activities they perform with it. The insights are based on opinions of users of that device across the internet using Machine learning and Natural Language processing, to provide an aspect - based(performance, camera etc) verdict allowing users to quickly and reliably decide whether to purchase a device or not. Our main project aims to implement a major portion of the technology powering this.
additional: Future Project: Debunker - An app that prevents users from falling prey to fake news and websites by warning and generating counter messages to tackle the issue of misinformation in social media. Won the second prize in AngelHack Global hackathon series : Kochi, for presenting the prototype.

name: KENLEAD
description: KENLEAD aims to provide the best service and products which is sure to make our customers contended. We identify the needs of the society and neighbourhood and try to provide a simple but effective solution.
additional: PRODUCTS :KTU REWINDThis is a product provided to the students who are pursuing their under graduation under APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University, Kerala. We saw many students faced the problem of not having a easily revisable material with them to prepare before the exam and when it comes to making lecture notes it�s not everyone�s cup of tea. So our aim is to provide the students with materials which will contain the entire syllabus in a capsule form.

name: NIVATA INFOSEC
description: Nivata infosec is a cybersecurity startup founded by an inspired and enthusiastic team of students in NSS COLLEGE of ENGINEERING, PALAKKAD. First project is an IOT Intrusion Detection Device empowered with latest machine learning techniques to detect malicious activity. We also provide security services including penetration testing.
